text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, magued ʙa Pajomʙar Muhammad (sallallohu alajhi va sallam)-«ro'ino», zero jahudijon ʙa Pajomʙar sallallohu alajhi va sallam "ro'ino" meguftand. Va qasdi onho dasnom ʙud. Bigued ej mu'minon: ʙa ivazi "Ro'ino", "Unzurno", ja'ne. "ʙa mo nigoh kun!". Va nek ʙisnaved, az kitoʙi Parvardigoraton, on ci ki tilovat karda mesavad. Va inkorkunandagonro azoʙi dardovar ast
